alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Duval County through 415 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacksonville, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Arlington, Fort Caroline, San Marco, Riverside and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
